mongodbDatabaseArticles.content:
This tea house is quite relaxing and comfortably designed but it’s really the views of Granada that make it special. The balcony only holds about 3 tables so you’re best bet is to come around slower times in the mid-to-late afternoon.


View Spain in a larger map
